name: ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal
desc: The options that specify your app's tracking requirements.

items.name: case anyPlane
items.desc: A goal that specifies your app requires a plane of any type.

items.name: case horizontalPlane
items.desc: A goal that specifies your app requires a horizontal plane.

items.name: case tracking
items.desc: A goal that specifies your app requires basic world tracking.

items.name: case verticalPlane
items.desc: A goal that specifies your app requires a vertical plane.

items.name: case geoTracking
items.desc: A goal that specifies your app requires a precise geographic location.
